problems.title: Max Window Sum
problems.description:
You are given an array of integers and a window size k. Your task is to find the maximum sum of any contiguous subarray of size k. If k is greater than the array size, print 0.

Input Format:
First line: two integers n and k.
Second line: n space-separated integers.

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the maximum sum of any window of size k, or 0 if such window does not exist.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
7 3
2 5 -1 7 3 -1 2

Sample Output
11

Explanation:
The maximum sum window is [5, -1, 7] with sum 11.
hintsList: Compute the sum of the first window of size k directly.
Slide the window by one element at a time: subtract the element leaving the window and add the new element entering it.
